results.text: For if you forgive other people when they sin against you, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.
results.reason: Emphasizes the importance of forgiveness in our relationship with God.
results.reflection: Forgiving others allows us to receive God's forgiveness.

results.text: Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.
results.reason: Encourages believers to forgive others as they have been forgiven by God.
results.reflection: God's forgiveness should motivate us to forgive others.

results.text: Bear with each other and forgive one another if any of you has a grievance against someone. Forgive as the Lord forgave you.
results.reason: Reminds us to forgive others as we have been forgiven by the Lord.
results.reflection: Reflect God's forgiveness by extending it to others.

results.text: Do not judge, and you will not be judged. Do not condemn, and you will not be condemned. Forgive, and you will be forgiven.
results.reason: Teaches the principle of receiving forgiveness by extending it to others.
results.reflection: Our forgiveness of others mirrors the forgiveness we receive from God.

results.text: And when you stand praying, if you hold anything against anyone, forgive them, so that your Father in heaven may forgive you your sins.
results.reason: Connects forgiveness of others to receiving forgiveness from God.
results.reflection: Forgiveness is key to maintaining a close relationship with God.
